example.eg: His comment about the parking problems was unhelpful.  A lot of readers had left comments below the blog post.
example.egtrans: 他就泊车问题发表了一点意见。许多读者都在那篇博文下面发表了自己的意见。

example.eg: I've added my comments in the margin.
example.egtrans: 我在页边的空白处加了评论。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 注解, 注释, 说明

example.eg: The President refused to comment on his secretary's accusations.
example.egtrans: 对于秘书的指控，总统拒绝评论。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 就...进行评论, 就...发表意见

example.eg: Audrey commented about the newspaper article.
example.egtrans: 奥德丽就报纸上的文章发表了意见。
